name: GeneBox
description:
GeneBox

You're a biology professor and have to create organisms which can survive in different dangerous environments. Laboratory has super modern tool to construct genomes. You need to use it to evolve your little creatures. Their behavior depends on its genes: they can eat, divide, sense light, feel hunger, find other microbes and many other things. Let's make science fun!

Features

  • You can control your organisms using simply graphical genome constructor
  • Use zoom to see your creatures in detail
  • 20 different levels (including tutorial), 1 target - survive!
  • Graphical organism statistics
  • Detailed educational hints
  • Separate educational introduction

Scientific puzzle game which was created together with a biologist.
